Title: Treatments for hereditary haemochromatosis: A network meta-analysis
Abstract: © 2015 The Cochrane Collaboration.This is the protocol for a review and there is no abstract. The objectives are as follows: To assess the comparative benefits and harms of different interventions in the treatment of hereditary haemochromatosis through a network meta-analysisand to generate rankings of the available treatments according to their safety and efficacy.
